12-0_training_50_0:
SELECT MIN(cn.name) AS movie_company, MIN(mi_idx.info) AS rating, MIN(t.title) AS drama_horror_movie
FROM random_company_name_1 AS cn,
 random_company_type_1 AS ct,
 random_info_type_1 AS it1,
 random_info_type_1 AS it2,
 random_movie_companies_1 AS mc,
 random_movie_info_1 AS mi,
 random_movie_info_idx_1 AS mi_idx,
 random_title_1 AS t
WHERE t.id = mi.movie_id
 AND t.id = mi_idx.movie_id
 AND mi.info_type_id = it1.id
 AND mi_idx.info_type_id = it2.id
 AND t.id = mc.movie_id
 AND ct.id = mc.company_type_id
 AND cn.id = mc.company_id
 AND mc.movie_id = mi.movie_id
 AND mc.movie_id = mi_idx.movie_id
 AND mi.movie_id = mi_idx.movie_id
AND cn.country_code = '[fr]'
AND ct.kind = 'distributors'
AND it1.info = 'genres'
AND it2.info = 'votes'
AND mi.info IN ('Short', 'Short', 'Short', 'Short', 'Short')
AND mi_idx.info > '7.8'
AND t.production_year BETWEEN 1938 AND 2008;

Duke refuses to pay the bribes they demand, so then he and his lady friend Aretha are threatened and attacked by the crooked cops. Rather than take them on himself, Duke calls on his old pal Roy.
